EmailTemplate.name: WSJ Email 2 No Price
EmailTemplate.subject: Did you see me in the Wall Street Journal?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.ACDF_Fname__c},
I have a unique opportunity that I think you might be interested in.
Wealth Managers You Need to Know in The Wall Street Journal Each day, a coveted audience of thousands of leaders, influencers and investors turn to The Wall Street Journal for their news and financial information.
Appear regionally in a full-page feature within The Wall Street Journal as one of the Five Star Wealth Managers consumers need to know. This is a rare chance to reach a key group of prospects and differentiate yourself from other wealth managers in the area.
Click here for more details: {!Opportunity.Market_Guidebook_No_Price__c}
Space is limited for this special section. Donâ€™t miss your chance to stand out and be recognized as a leading professional in the wealth management industry! To learn more about this exclusive opportunity, give me a call today.
Thank you,
{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} Account Manager
Five Star Professional {!Opportunity.OwnerPhone} {!Opportunity.OwnerEmail} www.fivestarprofessional.com
